### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position=x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position=x=111.5, y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position=x=106.5, y=-32.5)

### Copper ore mine at unknown position
No information available about the mine structure

### Iron ore processing at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of furnace(position=x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Transport system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of belt(position=x=63.5, y=-53.5) and belt(position=x=64.5, y=-53.5)

### Water supply system at position(x=105.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position=x=106.5, y=-32.5) and pipe group(fluid_system=145486)

### Steam supply system at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of boiler(position=x=111.5, y=-32.0) and pipe group(fluid_system=145485)

### Electricity distribution system at position(x=112.5, y=-24.5)
Consists of electricity group(id=577484) with poles at positions (x=112.5, y=-24.5), (x=111.5, y=-27.5) and (x=111.5, y=-30.5)


### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when inserting items into a furnace: 
  - Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace
* Errors when using entities: 
  - Make sure to check the entity's status and warnings before using it


### NAMESPACE
* Defined utility functions: None
* Important variables: 
  - inventory: {'wooden-chest': 1, 'transport-belt': 108, 'burner-inserter': 3, 'small-electric-pole': 8, 'pipe': 13, 'stone-furnace': 1, 'wood': 2, 'coal': 92, 'iron-ore': 80, 'copper-ore': 20, 'iron-plate': 363, 'copper-plate': 1, 'iron-gear-wheel': 52} (type: dictionary)
